lines: 1. Ngocha nd' Omosalaba,Inch' Omwor' omouko;Natigire bi'ens'eye,Ntunyan' Omosalaba.
Nagwanchir' aye Yeso,Eng'ondi ya Kalwari;Nakunamir' as'oreOnkonye Omotoria.
2. Nakorereira mono,Nabuirwe n'ebibe;Yes' otebire bori,"Nindabitinyie bionsi".
3. Bionsi narur' as'ore,Ribaga ne chinguru;'Nkoro yane narure,Bibe biao botambe:
4. Yeso nache naende!Naisanek' as'are,Ker' oyor' omochenu,Motogie Omotoria.
